channel.title: tokens on Blockchain Daily
channel.description: Recent content in tokens on Blockchain Daily

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-03-07
item.description: Notifi Is Latest Startup Trying to Crack Web 3’s Push Notification Problem (1 minute read) Notifi is a company that aims to create better communication rails for crypto projects and wallets, starting with the Solana and Terra ecosystems.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-18
item.description: Interchain Accounts is the biggest upgrade to Cosmos since Stargate (2 minute read) The Interchain Foundation, a non-profit steward of the Cosmos ecosystem, has announced the release of Interchain Accounts, a protocol that allows blockchains to access the application features of other blockchains.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-17
item.description: Twitter lets you tip creators with Ethereum (1 minute read) Twitter is expanding its tipping options to include Ethereum.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-01-17
item.description: ‘Wen Token?’: Polymarket’s New Airdrop Futures Market Has Answers (3 minute read) Polymarket has launched Airdrop Futures, a new market where speculators can bet on whether projects will airdrop tokens.
